snippet: Investments typically considered less risky, like bonds, gold and utilities stocks, declined.
abstract: Stocks edge higher as investors await outcome of talks between Greece and its creditors.
lead_paragraph: Investments typically considered less risky, like bonds, gold and utilities stocks, declined.

headline.main: Shares Edge Up as Investors Watch Talks on Greek Debt
headline.print_headline: Shares Edge Up as Investors Watch Talks on Greek Debt
